author: aterrell
title: Arsenal are ready to act on snapping up Leicester City’s 14-year-old whizkid Terell Pennant, but know they face competition from Manchester United
text:
EFL TEENAGE DREAMS Arsenal are ready to act on snapping up Leicester City’s 14-year-old whizkid Terell Pennant, but know they face competition from Manchester United 
The Gunners have been keeping tabs on the promising youngster who recently bagged a brace against Southampton's under-16s By Jake Lambourne 18th March 2017, 10:20 pm Updated: 18th March 2017, 10:38 pm
